verbose_text: Neither knockdown of endogenous Denr nor forced expression of mouse Denr or human DENR led to precocious gliogenesis (immunostaining for glial fibrillary acidic protein [GFAP]) or excessive programmed cell death (visualized via immunostaining for the pro apoptotic marker activated-caspase 3; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY H and S2I), thus ruling out these factors as potential confounds.
evidence: expression of mouse Denr or human DENR
